page.title: 16Girls in the football team
page.content: This year Grade Ruan primary school was in the newspapers and on television in the programme "That's Life". It all started with a football match.We played football against another team and won 3-2. But after the game we were told we would have to play it again because we had a girl playing and it was against the rules. So, as we only have ten boys we had to play ten against eleven. We still beat them and got into the final. We still had to play ten against eleven and lost 3-2. So the BBC invited us to the television studios in London.At the "That's Life" studio we had to change into our football strip.We had to sing a song about twenty times.Eventually we got it right.Then we went to a hotel.It was good fun but we still cannot have a girl in our football team.
